We are Hiring, Looking for Remote work Candidates 🚀Job Title: Java Programmer (JRuby) Mode: Remote WorkingJob Description:- We are looking for an experienced Java Programmer with JRuby expertise to join our development team. You will be responsible for developing applications using JRuby, as well as integrating Java applications with Ruby scripts. This position requires strong technical skills in Java and Ruby, with experience using JRuby to run Ruby code within the JVM. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain applications using JRuby, and write Ruby code that interacts with Java libraries. Use Java with Ruby to access Java APIs and frameworks within Ruby projects. - Integrate Java libraries and dependencies into Ruby projects. - Create and manage interfaces between Ruby and Java systems, ensuring smooth integration. - Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure code quality and stability. - Collaborate with the development team to suggest and plan optimal technical solutions. - Write clear and understandable technical documentation for the developed code. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Experience in development with JRuby (preferred). - In-depth understanding of Java and experience using Java to build JVM-based applications. - Experience using Ruby, with the ability to write efficient and effective Ruby code. - Knowledge of Java-Ruby interoperability, including techniques like java_import, Java:: for accessing Java classes from Ruby. - Experience managing Java dependencies using Maven/Gradle and integrating them into Ruby projects. - Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in both Ruby and Java. - Experience with debugging and testing to ensure application stability. - Experience using version control tools such as Git. - Strong communication skills to work within a team and explain technical solutions clearly. Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025

You will be responsible for developing applications using JRuby, as well as integrating Java applications with Ruby scripts. This position requires strong technical skills in Java and Ruby, with experience using JRuby to run Ruby code within the JVM. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain applications using JRuby, and write Ruby code that interacts with Java libraries. Use Java with Ruby to access Java APIs and frameworks within Ruby projects. - Integrate Java libraries and dependencies into Ruby projects. - Create and manage interfaces between Ruby and Java systems, ensuring smooth integration. - Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure code quality and stability. - Collaborate with the development team to suggest and plan optimal technical solutions. - Write clear and understandable technical documentation for the developed code. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Experience in development with JRuby (preferred). - In-depth understanding of Java and experience using Java to build JVM-based applications. - Experience using Ruby, with the ability to write efficient and effective Ruby code. - Knowledge of Java-Ruby interoperability, including techniques like java_import, Java:: for accessing Java classes from Ruby. - Experience managing Java dependencies using Maven/Gradle and integrating them into Ruby projects. - Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in both Ruby and Java. - Experience with debugging and testing to ensure application stability. - Experience using version control tools such as Git. - Strong communication skills to work within a team and explain technical solutions clearly. Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025

You will be responsible for developing applications using JRuby, as well as integrating Java applications with Ruby scripts. This position requires strong technical skills in Java and Ruby, with experience using JRuby to run Ruby code within the JVM. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain applications using JRuby, and write Ruby code that interacts with Java libraries. Use Java with Ruby to access Java APIs and frameworks within Ruby projects. - Integrate Java libraries and dependencies into Ruby projects. - Create and manage interfaces between Ruby and Java systems, ensuring smooth integration. - Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure code quality and stability. - Collaborate with the development team to suggest and plan optimal technical solutions. - Write clear and understandable technical documentation for the developed code. Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? We are Hiring, Looking for Remote work Candidates 🚀Job Title: Java Programmer (JRuby) Mode: Remote WorkingJob Description:- We are looking for an experienced Java Programmer with JRuby expertise to join our development team. You will be responsible for developing applications using JRuby, as well as integrating Java applications with Ruby scripts. This position requires strong technical skills in Java and Ruby, with experience using JRuby to run Ruby code within the JVM. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain applications using JRuby, and write Ruby code that interacts with Java libraries. Use Java with Ruby to access Java APIs and frameworks within Ruby projects. - Integrate Java libraries and dependencies into Ruby projects. - Create and manage interfaces between Ruby and Java systems, ensuring smooth integration. - Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure code quality and stability. - Collaborate with the development team to suggest and plan optimal technical solutions. - Write clear and understandable technical documentation for the developed code. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Experience in development with JRuby (preferred). - In-depth understanding of Java and experience using Java to build JVM-based applications. - Experience using Ruby, with the ability to write efficient and effective Ruby code. - Knowledge of Java-Ruby interoperability, including techniques like java_import, Java:: for accessing Java classes from Ruby. - Experience managing Java dependencies using Maven/Gradle and integrating them into Ruby projects. - Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in both Ruby and Java. - Experience with debugging and testing to ensure application stability. - Experience using version control tools such as Git. - Strong communication skills to work within a team and explain technical solutions clearly. Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025

ensure the protection of enterprise systems and data. •	Design and implement scalable IAM solutions using tools like OAuth, OpenID Connect, and SAML. •	Collaborate with development teams to integrate IAM protocols and security features in applications. •	Oversee the configuration and management of Identity Provider (IdP) tools (e.g., ADFS, Okta, Auth0). •	Develop and maintain custom IAM policies, access control models, and governance frameworks. •	Conduct security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with industry best practices and regulatory requirements. •	Provide leadership and mentorship to security teams, driving innovation and continuous improvement. •	Stay up-to-date with the latest IAM trends, tools, and vulnerabilities.Required Skills & Expertise: •	Strong expertise in OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect protocols. •	Hands-on experience with Identity Provider (IdP) tools (e.g., Okta, Auth0, ADFS, Azure AD). •	Solid understanding of Identity Federation and Single Sign-On (SSO). •	Experience with Java and JavaScript development, including implementing IAM features and APIs. •	Familiarity with security frameworks and standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001, SOC 2). •	Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills in complex security environments. •	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate across teams and stakeholders. •	A proactive, results-driven mindset with a focus on continuous improvement.Preferred Qualifications: •	Certifications like CISSP, CISM, or Certified Identity and Access Manager (CIAM) are a plus. •	Experience with multi-cloud environments and IAM integrations. •	Familiarity with DevSecOps practices and tools.If you’re ready to make an impact and lead the charge in securing critical enterprise assets, we want to Hi Team, Greetings from TNS India Foundation!It was very nice talking to you!! At TNS India Foundation (TNSIF) NGO, a Section 25 Company under the Companies Act, 1956, we are committed to enhancing employability and workplace skills for deserving youth through our Future Skills Program. This initiative equips students with essential technical and professional skills, preparing them for successful careers in esteemed organizations like yours.We recently came across your recruitment drive, Hiring for Trainee, and are keen to explore opportunities for collaboration.TNSIF provides free-of-cost access to a pool of trained and groomed candidates across domains such as Java, Full Stack Development, Angular, and Desktop Support. We also have candidates skilled in Customer Support for Non-Voice Process roles. Our program spans multiple states, including Karnataka, Hyderabad, Delhi, Gujarat, Maharashtra, and Tamil Nadu.TNSIF Offers:Quality Candidates: IT Graduates (BE, BTech, B.Sc., BCA, and B.Sc. Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. Hi Team, Greetings from TNS India Foundation!It was very nice talking to you!! At TNS India Foundation (TNSIF) NGO, a Section 25 Company under the Companies Act, 1956, we are committed to enhancing employability and workplace skills for deserving youth through our Future Skills Program. This initiative equips students with essential technical and professional skills, preparing them for successful careers in esteemed organizations like yours.We recently came across your recruitment drive, Hiring for Trainee, and are keen to explore opportunities for collaboration.TNSIF provides free-of-cost access to a pool of trained and groomed candidates across domains such as Java, Full Stack Development, Angular, and Desktop Support. We also have candidates skilled in Customer Support for Non-Voice Process roles. Our program spans multiple states, including Karnataka, Hyderabad, Delhi, Gujarat, Maharashtra, and Tamil Nadu.TNSIF Offers:Quality Candidates: IT Graduates (BE, BTech, B.Sc., BCA, and B.Sc. Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? We are Hiring, Looking for Remote work Candidates 🚀Job Title: Java Programmer (JRuby) Mode: Remote WorkingJob Description:- We are looking for an experienced Java Programmer with JRuby expertise to join our development team. You will be responsible for developing applications using JRuby, as well as integrating Java applications with Ruby scripts. This position requires strong technical skills in Java and Ruby, with experience using JRuby to run Ruby code within the JVM. Key Responsibilities: - Develop and maintain applications using JRuby, and write Ruby code that interacts with Java libraries. Use Java with Ruby to access Java APIs and frameworks within Ruby projects. - Integrate Java libraries and dependencies into Ruby projects. - Create and manage interfaces between Ruby and Java systems, ensuring smooth integration. - Perform unit testing and debugging to ensure code quality and stability. - Collaborate with the development team to suggest and plan optimal technical solutions. - Write clear and understandable technical documentation for the developed code. Required Skills and Qualifications: - Experience in development with JRuby (preferred). - In-depth understanding of Java and experience using Java to build JVM-based applications. - Experience using Ruby, with the ability to write efficient and effective Ruby code. - Knowledge of Java-Ruby interoperability, including techniques like java_import, Java:: for accessing Java classes from Ruby. - Experience managing Java dependencies using Maven/Gradle and integrating them into Ruby projects. - Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code in both Ruby and Java. - Experience with debugging and testing to ensure application stability. - Experience using version control tools such as Git. - Strong communication skills to work within a team and explain technical solutions clearly. Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? 🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? 🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? 🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

That’s what’s getting people to reach out.✅ Your next opportunity might not be posted - Some of the best leads came from conversations, not job boards.✅ Helping others creates momentum - By offering value first, I’ve built real connections that could lead to long-term opportunities.🚀 𝗪𝗲𝗲𝗸 𝟰 𝗙𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀?Keep sharing my knowledge and insights.Double down on networking and engaging in meaningful conversations.Stay open to unexpected opportunities - because they’re happening.If you’re also in the job hunt, let’s connect! Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? 🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

𝗪𝗲𝗲𝗸 𝟯 𝗼𝗳 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲 - 𝗣𝗼𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗨𝗻𝘁𝗶𝗹 𝗜 𝗚𝗲𝘁 𝗛𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱! 🚀They say consistency breeds results, and this week proved that to be true.While I haven’t landed a full-time remote role yet, something unexpected has happened... by showing up, sharing my expertise, and engaging in real conversations, people have started reaching out to me.💡 Some have asked for support.💡 Others have referred me to opportunities I didn’t even know existed.💡 And a few have connected me directly with hiring managers.This job hunt journey has taught me that visibility = opportunity. When people see what you do and how you think, they remember you when the right moment comes.📌 𝗧𝗵𝗶𝘀 𝘄𝗲𝗲𝗸’𝘀 𝗯𝗶𝗴𝗴𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗮𝘄𝗮𝘆𝘀:✅ Show, don’t just tell - Instead of just saying I'm looking for a role, I’m demonstrating my skills and expertise. That’s what’s getting people to reach out.✅ Your next opportunity might not be posted - Some of the best leads came from conversations, not job boards.✅ Helping others creates momentum - By offering value first, I’ve built real connections that could lead to long-term opportunities.🚀 𝗪𝗲𝗲𝗸 𝟰 𝗙𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀?Keep sharing my knowledge and insights.Double down on networking and engaging in meaningful conversations.Stay open to unexpected opportunities - because they’re happening.If you’re also in the job hunt, let’s connect! Top Talent Acquisition & Recruitment Trends for 2025The hiring landscape is evolving rapidly, and companies must adapt to stay ahead. Here are some key recruitment trends shaping 2025:✅ AI & Automation – AI is revolutionizing recruitment by streamlining candidate sourcing, screening, and scheduling, reducing time-to-hire and improving the quality of hires.✅ Skills-Based Hiring – Organizations are shifting focus from degrees to skills, enabling greater diversity and internal mobility while filling critical roles effectively.✅ Candidate Experience – A smooth, engaging recruitment journey with clear communication and timely feedback is becoming a key differentiator for top employers.✅ Flexible Work Models – Hybrid and remote options are now a necessity to attract and retain top talent. Companies sticking to rigid work models risk losing out.✅ Employer Value Proposition (EVP) – Competitive EVP, emphasizing growth, flexibility, and well-being, is crucial in attracting and retaining top professionals.✅ Data-Driven Hiring – Analytics are playing a bigger role in hiring decisions, helping companies refine their processes and make better talent choices.✅ Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) – Companies are prioritizing DEI by removing hiring biases, using inclusive language in job descriptions, and fostering diverse workplaces.✅ Continuous Learning & Development – Upskilling and reskilling initiatives are becoming essential as companies invest in preparing employees for future roles.The recruitment game is changing. Is your organization keeping up?hashtag#TalentAcquisition hashtag#HiringTrends hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#HRLinkedIn LinkedIn Guide to Creating

"What Do Recruiters Actually Do? (It’s More Than Just Hiring!)"Most people think recruiters just post jobs and wait for candidates to show up. WRONG.Recruiting is like matchmaking but instead of swiping left and right, we’re hunting for top talent, negotiating deals, and making careers happen.Here’s what we REALLY do behind the scenes:🔥 We’re Talent Detectives – We don’t just scan resumes. We dig deep to find hidden gems who aren’t even job hunting yet.📞 We Play Phone Tag... A Lot – Ever wonder why recruiters call so much? Because one phone call can change a career. Your career.💼 We Sell YOU to Companies – You might have the skills, but if no one knows your worth, you’re invisible. We make sure hiring managers see your value.💰 We Fight for Your Worth – That salary negotiation? We handle that. Our job is to make sure you don’t settle for peanuts.⏳ We Save You Time – Instead of applying to 100 jobs and hearing nothing, we get your resume straight to the decision-makers.At the end of the day, a great recruiter isn’t just finding jobs—we’re building careers, creating opportunities, and making sure you land in the RIGHT role.So next time you see a recruiter in your inbox, don’t ignore it. It might just be the message that changes everything.👉 Looking for your next big move? 🚨 Don’t quit your job thinking you’ll land another one overnight 🚨 The job market is tougher than ever and here’s why:1️⃣ Unprecedented competitionThe job market is one of the most competitive in history with thousands of candidates going for the same roles. Right now, the average job posting gets over 250 applicants, making it harder to stand out.2️⃣ Backlog of talent from layoffs and COVIDThe layoffs during the pandemic have created a huge backlog of skilled professionals actively looking for work. These candidates bring years of experience and now they’re all fighting for the same positions. Plus, a lot of experienced people are hesitant to make a move with all the uncertainty, making the competition even tougher.3️⃣ Fewer promotions and internal movementCompanies are promoting less internally these days. They’re focused on cutting costs and staying stable, so there are fewer opportunities for upward mobility. That means people are staying in their current roles longer, which makes it harder to move up.4️⃣ Skill gapsEmployers are looking for highly specialised skills and adaptability. The demand for advanced technical expertise has never been higher and a lot of job seekers are struggling to bridge that gap.🛑What does this mean for you?•Don’t rush into leaving your current role without a solid plan.•Take time to upskill and find ways to stand out from the crowd.•Tap into your network and look for opportunities that aren’t always posted publicly.Most importantly: do not sit at home applying for 100’s of roles, this isn’t working in this competitive talent market! Remember, taking the time to plan your next move carefully is key to landing the right opportunity!***********************************************Hi 👋🏼 I’m Irene Kennedy and I help people navigate and elevate their careers without comporting their health and wellbeing. I cut through the noise and set you up for success. hashtag#careertips hashtag#newjob hashtag#quit hashtag#dontquit hashtag#hiring hashtag#careercoach hashtag#careergrowth

Preferred Skills: - Experience working in an Agile development environment. - Familiarity with Ruby frameworks like Rails, Sinatra, or others. - Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. - Experience with CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) and related tools. - Knowledge of cloud computing and experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.How to Apply:📩 Send your CV to lily.kamaliyah@atreusg.com📱 DM or WhatsApp: 08119931213hashtag#javaprogrammer hashtag#Rubyonrails hashtag#JRuby hashtag#Java hashtag#programmer hashtag#remoteworking hashtag#hiring hashtag#jobloker2025
